short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Minimalistic viewer for XKCD and CommitStrip comics

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will let you see XKCD, SMBC, CommitStrip and Dilbert comics anywhere, any time without even opening their websites. 
^Sure, you can do that.. just if want.

More comics sources are coming soon :D
